title: BoNeMEAL v1.2.0
body:
• Use eager loading on dashboard and punishment index pages for better performance
  • Added warning expiry on display
  • Added interface to view all player notes
  • Added interface to view all warnings
  • Support UUID with hyphens in player URLs (better compatibility with banmanager)
  • MineYourMind/BoNeMEAL@4ceb2fb: Actor name may be undefined
  • Other bugfixes
